sentences.en: By his own admission, he evaded taxes as a Florida real-estate speculator.
sentences.cn: 他亲口承认自己在佛罗里达从事房地产投机生意时逃过税。

sentences.en: Foote's most recent play, "Dividing the Estate," is an ensemble piece.
sentences.cn: 福特的最新戏剧《分房产》是个合演剧目。

sentences.en: For many they clearly represent an alternative to run-of-the-mill estate cars.
sentences.cn: 对于很多人来说，他们显然可以作为一般旅行车的替代品。

sentences.en: Half the shops are boarded up on the estate's small shopping street.
sentences.cn: 在该住宅区的小型购物街上有一半商店都已封上了门窗。

sentences.en: Hire someone with experience, someone who knows about real estate.
sentences.cn: 雇佣有经验、了解房地产业的人。
他的遗产价值为15万美元。

sentences.en: His mother's small estate had passed to him after her death.
sentences.cn: 他母亲死后留给他一小笔遗产。

sentences.en: I finally settled on a Mercedes estate.
sentences.cn: 我最后决定买一辆梅塞德斯客货两用车。

sentences.en: I naturally took him to be the owner of the estate.
sentences.cn: 我自然而然地把他当成了庄园的主人。

sentences.en: Police skirmished with youths on the estate last Friday.
sentences.cn: 上周五警方与一些青年在住宅区发生了冲突。

sentences.en: Remember, the estate agent is working for the vendor.
sentences.cn: 记住，房地产代理商是为房地产卖方服务的。

sentences.en: The 77,000-acre estate contains five of the highest peaks in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 7.7万英亩的私人土地上有5座苏格兰最高的山峰。

sentences.en: The Advertising Standards Authority accused estate agents of using blatant untruths.
sentences.cn: 广告标准管理局控告房地产代理商使用无耻的谎言。

sentences.en: The allowable deduction is apportioned between the estate and the beneficiaries.
sentences.cn: 减免的税额在地产和受益人之间分摊。

sentences.en: The money will be used for the estate's upkeep.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱将用于物业维护。

sentences.en: The property is part of the deceased’s estate.
sentences.cn: 该产业是死者遗产的一部分。

sentences.en: We went straight to the estate agent and wrote out a cheque.
sentences.cn: 我们径直到房地产经纪人那里开了一张支票。

phrases.tran_cn: 房地产掮客，房地产经纪人
第四等级（新闻界的别称）
住宅区；居民村；房地产业
房地产评估；不动产评估
房地产经纪人，不动产经纪人
房地产金融；不动产财务
房地产管理；物业管理；不动产管理
房地产市场；不动产市场

trans.tran_cn: 庄园，地产，住宅区，工业区，遗产
trans.tran_en: a large area of land in the country, usually with one large house on it and one owner
